attributes.action: Allow Elite Athletes to stay in EU countries for longer than 90 days
attributes.additional_details: Now with freedom of movement gone, Elite Athletes will struggle to compete and train in EU countries due to the 90 day rule. Most competitions for elites are abroad and limiting them to 90 days is impossible.
attributes.background: Allow Elite Athletes to compete and train in EU countries longer than 90 days. Negotiate a similar visa that the UK offers to foreign individuals so that athletes can continue to compete and train at the highest level.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569584
